| collected/ PopMatters link]
}} 'Collected' is a compilation album by Canadian rapper k-os. The album
contains recent tracks from the first three albums, the hit singles, and remixes
of a couple singles. The album also contains three new tracks, two of which were
leftovers from [[Atlantis: Hymns for Disco]].
